data.name: Literal.Error.Address.Apartment
data.value: Lambar gidan ta bata ko ba a ganta ba. Gyara adireshinka.
data.comment: The error message for invalid apartment number.

data.name: Literal.Error.Address.Charset
data.value: Yi hakuri, bakaken Turanci kawai za ka yi amfani da su.
data.comment: The error message when data is in charset that is not supported by address verification.

data.name: Literal.Error.Address.DoubleConfirm
data.value: Ba za mu iya tantantance adireshinka ba. Tabbatar da adireshinka sannan ka danna "Na gaba>".
data.comment: The error message when address verification system requires user to double confirm the address.

data.name: Literal.Error.Address.ID
data.value: Lambar gida ba ta aiki. Gyara adireshinka.
data.comment: The error message for invalid apartment ID.

data.name: Literal.Error.Address.Insufficient
data.comment: The error message for insufficient information for address.

data.name: Literal.Error.Address.InvalidData
data.value: Adireshi ba ya aiki. Gyara adireshinka.
data.comment: The error message when data is missing for address verification.

data.name: Literal.Error.Address.Multiple
data.value: Adireshi ba ya aiki. Gyara adireshinka.
data.comment: The error message for invalid address.

data.name: Literal.Error.Address.Pobox
data.value: Akwatin gidan waya bai dace ba. Samar da adireshinka.
data.comment: The error message for POBOX.

data.name: Literal.Error.Address.PostalCode
data.value: An kasa gano lambar gidan waya. Gyara adireshinka.
data.comment: The error message for invalid postal code.

data.name: Literal.Error.Address.Route
data.value: An kasa samun Mai gane aikin hanyar jona sadawa ko kuma an kasa kaiwa inda take. Gyara adireshinka.
data.comment: The error message for route service error.

data.name: Literal.Error.Address.Street
data.value: kasa gano sunan titin a cikin lambar akwatin wasikun da aka fayyace. Gyara adireshinka.
data.comment: The error message for route service error.

data.name: Literal.Error.AuthzFail
data.value: Ba za mu iya bada izinin biyan ba. Ka tabbatar bayanin daidai ne, ko kuma ka yi amfani da wata hanyar biyan. Idan ka ci gaba da samun wannan sako, tuntubi bankinka.
data.comment: The error message shown when card authorization fails.

data.name: Literal.Error.AuthzFail2
data.value: Akwai wata matsala a lokacin inganta hanyarka ta biyan kuɗi. Tuntuɓi cibiyar kula da abokan ciniki don tallafi.
data.comment: The error message shown when card authorization fails. Probably, the PI is rejected by risk.

data.name: Literal.Error.AuthzFail.BR
data.value: Ba a samu ba da izini ga wannan cinikayya ba. Don Allah tabbatar da bayaninka. Ya yiwu ba a yarda da wasu katunan biyan kuɗi ta wajen wannan dandali ba, a wannan hali, muna shawarta yin amfani da wani katin biyan kuɗi dabam. Idan matsalar ta nace, kana iya tuntuɓi hukumar sha'anin kuɗi ɗinka.
data.comment: The error message shown when card authorization fails in Brazil. Probably, the debit / credit card that the user tried to add is not accepted.

data.name: Literal.Error.AuthzFail.MX
data.value: Ba a samu ba da izini ga wannan cinikayya ba. Don Allah tabbatar da bayaninka. Ya yiwu ba a yarda da wasu katunan biyan kuɗi ta wajen dandalin biyan kuɗi ɗin ba saboda dokokin tsaro da aka kafa. Idan matsalar ta nace, kana iya tuntuɓi hukumar sha'anin kuɗi ɗinka.
data.comment: The error message shown when card authorization fails in Mexico. Probably, the debit / credit card that the user tried to add is not accepted.

data.name: Literal.Error.CardUsedMuiltipleTimes
data.value: An kara hanyar biyanka ga asusu masu yawa. Sake gwadawa da wata.
data.comment: The error message shown when user tries to add an card is used too many times.

data.name: Literal.Error.CcExpired
data.value: Katin bankinka aikinsa ya ƙare. Zabi ranar karewar aiki a gaba.
data.comment: The error message shown when the credit card is expired.

data.name: Literal.Error.CcNumberInvalid
data.value: Lambar katin bankinka ba ta aiki. Shigar da lambar katin banki mai aiki.
data.comment: The error message shown when the credit card number is invalid.

data.name: Literal.Error.DdBankCodeInvalid
data.value: Lambarka ta routing ba ta aiki, shigar da bayani mai kyau.
data.comment: The error message shown when the direct debit bank code is invalid.

data.name: Literal.Error.DdBranchCodeInvalid
data.value: Sot kod dinka ba ta aiki, shigar da bayanin mai kyau.
data.comment: The error message shown when the direct debit branch code is invalid.

data.name: Literal.Error.DdNumberInvalid
data.value: Lambar asusu ba ta aiki, shigar da bayani mai kyau.
data.comment: The error message shown when the direct debit account number is invalid.

data.name: Literal.Error.AccountIdInvalid
data.comment: The error message is shown when the billable account id is invalid.

data.name: Literal.Error.AccountLocked
data.comment: The error message is shown when the billable account is locked or disabled.

data.name: Literal.Error.EnterValidInfo
data.comment: The error message shown when user enters invalid information.

data.name: Literal.Error.EnterValidInfo2
data.value: Bayanin hanyar biyan kuɗinka ba shi da kyau. Idan ka ci gaba da samun wannan saƙo, gwada wata hanyar biyan kuɗi daban ko ka tuntuɓi cibiyar kula da abokan ciniki don tallafi.
data.comment: The error message shown when user enters invalid information.

data.name: Literal.Error.InvalidAddress
data.value: Adireshinka ba ya aiki, shigar da bayani mai kyau.
data.comment: The error message shown when the address is invalid.

data.name: Literal.Error.InvalidAddress2
data.value: Adireshinka ba shi da kyau. Ka tabbata bayanin adireshinka daidai ne.
data.comment: The error message shown when the address is invalid.

data.name: Literal.Error.InvalidCity
data.value: Birninka ba ya aiki, shigar da bayani mai kyau.
data.comment: The error message shown when the city is invalid.

data.name: Literal.Error.InvalidPhoneType
data.value: Bayanan wayarka bai da inganci. Don allah shigar da bayani mai inganci.
data.comment: The error message shown when the phone type is not valid.

data.name: Literal.Error.InvalidState
data.value: Jiharka ba ta aiki, shigar da bayani mai kyau.
data.comment: The error message shown when the state is invalid.

data.name: Literal.Error.InvalidZipcode
data.value: Lambar akwatin gidan wayarka ba ya aiki, shigar da bayani mai kyau.
data.comment: The error message shown when the zipcode is invalid.

data.name: Literal.Error.PhoneNumberRequired
data.comment: The error message shown when the phone number is missing.

data.name: Literal.Error.PiAlreadyExists
data.value: Ba za mu iya shigar da wannan nau'in biyan ba saboda akwai shi a cikin asusunka. Sake gwadawa da wani.
data.comment: The error message shown when user tries to add an card that is already added.

data.name: Literal.Error.PiAlreadyExists2
data.value: Ba za mu iya ƙara hanyar biyan kuɗi ba. Ka tabbata ba a riga an ƙara hanyar zuwa ga asususnka ba. Idan ka ci gaba da samun wannan saƙo, gwada wata hanyar biyan kuɗi daban ko ka tuntuɓi cibiyar kula da abokan ciniki don tallafi.
data.comment: The error message shown when user tries to add an card that is already added.

data.name: Literal.Error.PiBanned
data.value: An soke nau'in biyanka. Sake gwadawa da wani.
data.comment: The error message shown when the PI is banned.

data.name: Literal.Error.PiExceedMaxOwnership
data.value: Bayanin da ka samar an yi amfani da shi a asusu masu yawa. Shigar da wani asusun ko adireshin mel dabam.
data.comment: The error message shown when user tries to add a pi which has been used by other accounts for many times.

data.name: Literal.Error.PiLimitExceeded
data.value: An kasa sanya zabukan biya. Yi amfani da zabin biyan da ake amfani da shi, ko ka cire zabin biya.
data.comment: The error message shown when paper check last name is not correct.

data.name: Literal.Error.SaInIntermediateStatus
data.value: Ba za mu iya kammala buƙatarka ba yanzu saboda za a yi cajin katin bankinka yau don daya daga cikin rijistocinka.
data.comment: The error message shown when the PI is in intermediate status.

data.name: Literal.Consent.Content.AR
data.value:
Don samar maka da hajoji ko ayyuka ana buƙatar ka buɗe asusun mai amfani. Duk lokacin da ka samar da sabuwar hanyar biyan kuɗo ga wata haja za mu samar da wannan bayani sannan mu nemi amincewarka kafin ka ci gaba. Lokaci kuma don budɗe asusu da/ko ƙarin sabuwar hanyar biyan kuɗi za a buƙaci da ka samar da bayanan da suka shafe ka kamar: sunanka, adireshi, lambar waya, adireshin imel, lambar katin banki da kuma Lambar asusu banki. Za kuma mu iya neman adireshinka na IP da kuma bayanan na'urarka sannan mu danganta waɗannan bayanai da bayanan da suka shafe ka waɗanda ka bayar yayin buɗe asusu ko lokacin ƙara sabuwar hanyar biyan kuɗi.
Ina mai furta cewa na bada izini ga Kamfanin Microsoft, rassanta da ƙananan kamfanonin ƙarƙashinta, don yin amfani da bayanan da suka shafe ni waɗanda na samar a nan, a bisa ƙa'idojin da Doka mai lamba 25,326, sashi na 5 ta zayyana don aika mini da takardun da ta ke bugawa da/ko kayan talla da suka shafi tallar hajoji da ayyukansu. Ina shaida cewa ƙarƙashin Doka mai lamba 25,326, sashi na 6, an sanar da ni game da ganin dama cikin al'amarin
Ƙin samar da bayanai ba ya haifar da wani mummunan sakamako da ya wuce rashin samun damar amfana da hajoji da ayyukan da wannan shafin intanet ke samarwa. Idan na samar da bayanai na, to ina bayyana cewa na amince a adana waɗannan bayanai a ma'adanar bayanai ta Kamfanin Microsoft da ke Redmond, WA98052. Mamallakin bayanan da suka shafi mutum yana da damar aiwatar da damarsa/ta don duba waɗannan bayanai ba tare da ya biya ba a tsakanin lokutan da ba su gaza watanni shida ba sai dai akwai hujjar da ta bayyana ta yunƙurin yin amfani da bayanan ta wata hanya sabanin wadda Doka mai lamba 25,326, shashi na 14, ƙaramin sashe ta zayyana. Hukumar da ke da alhakin aiwatar da Doka mai lamba 25,326, ita ce MA'AIKATAR KULA DA KARE BAYANAI DA SUKA SHAFI MUTUM TA AJANTINA kuma don haka tana da ƙarfin yin hukunci a kan kowane irin ƙorafi da/ko karar neman hakki da aka shigar bisa dalilin ƙin yin aiki da sashen doka da ya shafi bayanan da suka shafi kare mutum.
Za ka iya samun damar gani ko ka inganta bayanan da suka shafe ka a: https://billing.microsoft.com. A yanayin da ka zaɓi ka inganta bayanan da suka shafe ka kana bayar da izini ne da ke baiwa Kamfanin Microsoft damar tattarawa da kuma adana bayanan da suka shafe ka kamar yadda aka bayyana a sama .
Yayin buɗe asusu da kuma danna madannin "Yarda" a ƙasa ka yarda ka samar da bayanan da suka shafe ka ga Kamfanin Microsoft da kuma izininka ga Kamfanin Microsoft don karɓa da kuma canja mazaunin bayanan kamar yadda aka bayyana.

data.name: Literal.Consent.Content.HU
data.value:
Don samar maka da hajoji ko ayyuka ana buƙatar ka buɗe asusun mai amfani. Duk lokacin da ka samar da sabuwar hanyar biyan kuɗo ga wata haja za mu samar da wannan bayani sannan mu nemi amincewarka kafin ka ci gaba. Lokaci kuma don budɗe asusu da/ko ƙarin sabuwar hanyar biyan kuɗi za a buƙaci da ka samar da bayanan da suka shafe ka kamar: sunanka, adireshi, lambar waya, adireshin imel, lambar katin banki da kuma lambar asusun banki. Za kuma mu iya neman adireshinka na IP da kuma bayanan na'urarka sannan mu danganta waɗannan bayanai da bayanan da suka shafe ka waɗanda ka bayar yayin buɗe asusu ko lokacin ƙara sabuwar hanyar biyan kuɗi.
Ina mai furta cewa na bada izini ga Kamfanin Microsoft, rassanta da ƙananan kamfanonin ƙarƙashinta, don yin amfani da bayanan da suka shafe ni waɗanda na samar a nan, a bisa ƙa'idojin da Doka mai lamba 25,326, sashi na 5 ta zayyana don aika mini da takardun da ta ke bugawa da/ko kayan talla da suka shafi tallar hajoji da ayyukansu. Ina shaida cewa ƙarƙashin Doka mai lamba 25,326, sashi na 6, an sanar da ni game da ganin dama cikin al'amarin
Ƙin samar da bayanai ba ya haifar da wani mummunan sakamako da ya wuce rashin samun damar amfana da hajoji da ayyukan da wannan shafin intanet ke samarwa. Idan na samar da bayanai na, to ina bayyana cewa na amince a adana waɗannan bayanai a ma'adanar bayanai ta Kamfanin Microsoft da ke Redmond, WA98052. Mamallakin bayanan da suka shafi mutum yana da damar aiwatar da damarsa/ta don duba waɗannan bayanai ba tare da ya biya ba a tsakanin lokutan da ba su gaza watanni shida ba sai dai akwai hujjar da ta bayyana ta yunƙurin yin amfani da bayanan ta wata hanya sabanin wadda Doka mai lamba 25,326, shashi na 14, ƙaramin sashe ta zayyana. Hukumar da ke da alhakin aiwatar da Doka mai lamba 25,326, ita ce MA'AIKATAR KULA DA KARE BAYANAI DA SUKA SHAFI MUTUM TA AJANTINA kuma don haka tana da ƙarfin yin hukunci a kan kowane irin ƙorafi da/ko karar neman hakki da aka shigar bisa dalilin ƙin yin aiki da sashen doka da ya shafi bayanan da suka shafi kare mutum.
Za ka iya samun damar gani ko ka inganta bayanan da suka shafe ka a: https://billing.microsoft.com. A yanayin da ka zaɓi ka inganta bayanan da suka shafe ka kana bayar da izini ne da ke baiwa Kamfanin Microsoft damar tattarawa da kuma adana bayanan da suka shafe ka kamar yadda aka bayyana a sama .
Yayin buɗe asusu da kuma danna madannin "Yarda" a ƙasa ka yarda ka samar da bayanan da suka shafe ka ga Kamfanin Microsoft da kuma izininka ga Kamfanin Microsoft don karɓa da kuma canja mazaunin bayanan kamar yadda aka bayyana.

data.name: Literal.Consent.Content.KR
data.value:
Za a tattara wannan bayanin asusu da ake iya ganowa ta keɓe kuma a gusar da shi nan da nan a kan ƙirar asusu a cikin wata tsararriyar, ɓoyayyiyar hanya zuwa ga Microsoft Corporation a Hadaddiyar Daula don sarrafa cinikayyarka. Ana iya yi amfani da kuma riƙe irin waɗannan bayanai har na shekaru goma sha biyu daga ranar biyan kuɗi ɗinka na ƙarshe. Kana iya tuntuɓi Microsoft Corporation dangane da gudanarwar da wannan bayani da ake ganowa ta keɓe ta hanyar abokin ma'amala da aka jera a cikin Jumlar Sirri ta Kan layi na Microsoft da yake samuwa a nan: http://privacy.microsoft.com/ko-kr.
Microsoft yana iya bayyana bayani da ake ganowa ta keɓe ɗinka zuwa ga wasu, da suka haɗa amma ba taƙaicce ga CyberSource Corp., Receivable Management Services da Inicis ba. Ana gusar da bayaninka idan yin haka ya zaman lalle da azanci don sarrafa cinikayyarka, bi hanyar doka, ba da amsa ga diyya, hana zamba ko ɗauki mataki gwargwadon ƙa'idojin hukuma.
Kana iya iso ga ko gyaggyara bayanin da ake ganowa ta keɓe ɗinka a: https://commerce.microsoft.com. Yayin da ka zaɓi ka gyaggyara bayaninka kana samar da izini da zai ba wa Microsoft Corporation damar tattara da kuma gusar da bayanin da ake ganowa ta keɓe yanda aka bayyana a sama.
Ta hanyar ƙirƙirawa asusu da kuma dannawa maɓallin "Yarda" a ƙasa ka yarda ka samar ma Microsoft Corporation bayani da ake ganowa ta keɓe ɗinka kuma ka ba da izini ga Microsoft don ya tattara, gusar da, da kuma raba bayanin da ake ganowa ta keɓe ɗinka tare da wasu yadda aka bayyana a nan da kuma a cikin Jumlar Sirri ta Kan layi na Microsoft a nan: http://privacy.microsoft.com/ko-kr
data.comment: Consent text for KO-KR!

data.name: Literal.BoletoBancarioDesc.Help
data.value: Za a iya biyan Boleto ta ATM, a reshe da kuma ta harkar bankin intanet ta kowane banki, Ofishin aika wasiku, dillalin caca da kuma wasu manyan kantuna har sai wa'adin ya cika. Za a baka takardar biyan kudi ta Boleto, fitar da takardar ka biya don kammala cinikin.

data.name: Literal.MercadoPagoDesc.Help
data.value: MercadoPago tsarin biya ne mai aminci da ke ba ka damar zabi a cikin zabubbukan hanyoyin biya kamar kudi-hannu, turansifar banki, katin banki ko biyan kashi kashi, daga cikinsu. Za mu ja ka zuwa shafin MercadoPago don ka kammala sayayyarka.

data.name: Literal.OnlineBankTranferDesc.Help
data.value: Tiransifar Banki ta Kan intanet kan ba ka damar gudanr da hada hadar kudi a kan shafin intanet mai aminci da amintaccen banki ke gudanarwa. Za mu ja ka zuwa shafin bankinka don ka kammala sayayyarka.

data.name: Literal.PICVC.Input.Inform
data.value: An sanya hada hadar tantancewa ga katin bankinka. Duba takardar bayaninka ka shigar da hakikar kudin da tura asusunka - KO- shigar da lambobin shiga 3 da aka samu a cikin hada bayanin hadar.
data.comment: Inform of input.

data.name: Literal.PICVC.TermOfUse.Content
data.value:
• Za mu caje ka adadin kuɗi da ba za mu bayyana ba {0} {1} - {2} daga katin kudi ɗinka.
  • Za a yi ramuwar kuɗin da aka caje ka zarar ka kamala hanyar tabbatarwa.
  • Don a tabbatar da kai, dole ne ka shiga da daidai kudin da aka caja KO sirri mai lambobi guda uku da aka samar a cikin bayanin hada-hada. .
  • Za ka iya samu kudin da aka caja ko sirri mai lambobi guda uku ta bincika bayanin katin kuɗi ɗinka. Ya dogara da sabis na bankinka, za a yi wannan ne a kan layi, ta waya, ko ta hanyar bayani na takarda dake zuwa a cikin mel.
  • Kana bukata ka kammala wannan tabbatarwa kafin {3}, kuma kana da ragowar dama guda {4} na gwadawa.
  • Ya dogara da wurinka da kuma wurin bankin dake samar da katin, ƙila bankin zai caje Kuɗin Hada-huda na Duniya (ITF) ko sanya da cajin musaya kuɗi zuwa ga kudin da aka caja a lokacin hanyar tabbatarwa. Domin ka tabbatar idan za a sanya da wadannan cajin, sai ka duba da bankin dake samar da katinka. Microsoft BA zai rama cajin ITF ko musayar kuɗi da ya auku a lokacin tabbatarwa ba.
data.comment: PICVC term of use. {0} is for the currency. {1} is for the min amount to charge. {2} is for the max amount to charge. {3} is the exact time of challenge deadline. {4} is the left times to retry challenge.

data.name: Literal.PICVC.TermOfUse.Inform1
data.value: A matsayin ƙarin matakin tsaro, muna buƙatar tantance katin bankinka kafin ci gaba.
data.comment: PICVC inform1.

data.name: Literal.PICVC.TermOfUse.Inform2
data.value: Idan ka yarda da wadannan matakan tsaro, danna Na gaba don ka amince da yarjejeniyarka sannan ka fara aikin tantancewa. Don tsayar da aikin, danna Soke. Idan aka soke ko aka kasa gudanar da tantancewa, ba za a sanya katin bankinka a asusunka na kan intanet ba.
data.comment: PICVC inform2.

data.name: Literal.PICVC.TermOfUse.Title

data.name: Literal.PICVD.TermOfUse.Content
data.value:
\r\\n
  • Za mu saka adadin kuɗi da ba za mu bayyana ba tsakanin {0} {1} - {2} cikin asusun banki ɗinka.
    • \r\\n
  • Don a tabbatar da kai, dole ne ka shiga da daidai kudin da aka caja KO Code mai Lambobi 3 da aka samar a cikin bayanin hada-hada.
    • \r\\n
  • Za ka iya samu yawan kudin da aka saka da Code mai Lambobi 3 ta bincika bayanin asusun banki ɗinka. Ya dogara da sabis na bankinka, za a iya yi wannan a kan layi, ta waya, ko ta hanyar bayanin na takarda dake zuwa a cikin mel.
    • \r\\n
  • Kana bukata ka kammala wannan tabbatarwa kafin {3}, kuma kana da ragowar dama guda {4} na gwadawa.
    • \r\\n
data.comment: PICVD term of use. {0} is for the currency. {1} is for the min amount to charge. {2} is for the max amount to charge. {3} is the exact time of challenge deadline. {4} is the left times to retry challenge.

data.name: Literal.PICVD.TermOfUse.Inform1
data.value: A matsayin karin matakin tsaro, muna buƙatar tantance asusun bankinka kafin cigaba.

data.name: Literal.PICVD.TermOfUse.Inform2
data.value: Idan ka yarda da wannan matakin tsaron, danna Na gaba don ka tabbatar da yarjejeniyarka sannan ka fara aikin tantancewa. Don tsayar da aikin, danna Soke. Idan aka soke ko aka kasa tantancewa, ba za a sanya bankinka ba aa na kan intanet ba susunn.

data.value:
• Za mu caje ka adadin kuɗi da ba za mu bayyana ba {0} {1} - {2} daga ajiyar banki ɗinka.
  • Za a yi ramuwar kuɗin da aka caje ka zarar ka kamala hanyar tabbatarwa.
  • Don a tabbatar da kai, dole ne ka shiga da daidai kuɗin da aka caja KO sirri mai lambobi guda uku da aka samar a cikin bayanin hada-hada. .
  • Za ka iya samu kudin da aka caja ko sirri mai lambobi guda uku ta bincika bayanin ajiyar banki ɗinka. Ya dogara da sabis na bankinka, za a yi wannan ne a kan layi, ta waya, ko ta hanyar bayani na takarda dake zuwa a cikin mel.
  • Kana bukata ka kammala wannan tabbatarwa kafin {3}, kuma kana da ragowar dama guda {4} na gwadawa.
  • Ya dogara da wurinka da kuma wurin bankin dake samar ajiyar banki ɗinka, ƙila bankin zai caje Kuɗin Hada-hada na Duniya (ITF) ko sanya da cajin musaya kuɗi zuwa ga kudin da aka caja a lokacin hanyar tabbatarwa. Domin ka tabbatar idan za a sanya da wadannan cajin, sai ka duba da bankin dake samar da ajiyar banki ɗinka. Microsoft BA zai rama cajin ITF ko musayar kuɗi da ya auku a lokacin tabbatarwa ba.
data.comment: PICVC DDPayin term of use. {0} is for the currency. {1} is for the min amount to charge. {2} is for the max amount to charge. {3} is the exact time of challenge deadline. {4} is the left times to retry challenge.

data.name: Literal.Consent.Content.UA
data.value: Customers in Ukraine are required to print, sign and return to Microsoft the Microsoft Online Subscription Agreement (“Agreement”) promptly upon purchase of your subscription. If Microsoft has not received your signed, paper Agreement within three weeks after purchase, your subscription to the online service(s) will be terminated. Please send the Agreement to: Microsoft Ireland Operations Limited Atrium Building Block B Carmenhall Road Sandyford Industrial Estate Dublin 18, Ireland In addition, please read the entire Agreement below before accepting terms and conditions. Please click here to view and print the agreement.

data.name: Literal.PICV.SuccessContent.CreditCard
data.value: Madalla da tabbatar da katinka na kuɗi. An mayar maka da cajin kuɗin tabbatarwa kuma yanzu katinka na kuɗi yana samuwa domin amfani a kan asusunka na kan layi. Gwargwadon bankin ajiyarka, ƙila ya ɗauki tsawon kwanaki kafin ramuwar ta bayyana a kan asusunka.
data.comment: Challenge success message, ONLY for credit card.

data.name: Literal.CreditCheck.PreWarning
data.value: Gano da kuma katin kuɗi na biya kafin amfani ba su cancanci wannan garaɓasa ba.
data.comment: Pre warning for credit check.

data.name: Literal.CreditCheck.SSNInfo
data.value: Muna karɓar Lambar Tsaron Zamantake (SSN) daga gare ka da kuma raba ta tare da wasu ƙwararru domin aiwatar da bincika katin kuɗi don ƙayyade idan ya cancanci garaɓasar. Muna amfani da wasu matakai don taimakawa kare samun iso marar izini zuwa, amfani ko tona asirin lambobin SSN. Muna watasa SSN a kan wata tsararriyar hanyar sadarwa da kuma ɓoye ta tun kafin watsawar. Ba mu a riƙe lambar SSN bayan kammala bincika katin kuɗi, koda yake za mu riƙe wata farɗar mai ganowa da ake ɗebo daga lambar SSN ɗinka don wasu dalilai na sarrafawa. Haka nan za mu riƙe makin katin kuɗin da kuma sauran bayani da muka nemo a zaman wani ɓangaren katin kuɗin har sai ka kammala hada-hadarka da kuma gano hana almundahaka.
data.comment: Info for SSN.

data.name: Literal.CreditCheck.ThingsToKnow
data.value:
Wannan bincika katin kuɗi ba ya shafar kimanta katinka na kuɗi .
Anna amfani da lambar tsaron zamantakewarka saboda ka iya yin bincika katin kuɗi da kuma ƙayyade idan ka cancanci wannan garaɓasa.
Za ka iya yin canji ga bayanin biyan kuɗinka da kuma bayanan cajin kuɗi a gaba ta zuwa https://live.xbox.com/en-US/account
data.comment: Things to know on credit check.

data.name: Literal.CreditCardDesc.WindowsStore
data.value:
Lokacin da ka ƙara katin kuɗi a matsayin hanyar biyan kuɗi, Microsoft yana ba wa katin izini ta hanyar yin ɗan ƙaramin caji, na wucin-gadi zuwa asusunka. Ba za ka biya komai ba har sai ka sayi wani abu daga Wurin Adanar.
Kamfanin katin kuɗinka na iya yin cajin Kuɗin Hulɗa ta Duniya (ITF) ko kuma cajin maganar kuɗin ƙasa a lokacin da ka sayi wani abu daga Wurin Adanar.
data.comment: The description is only for CreditCard use for WindowsStore(Win-iframe and Windows partner).

data.name: Literal.CreditCardDesc.WindowsStore.NoITF
data.value: Idan ka ƙara wani katin amsar kuɗi a zaman wata hanyar biyan kuɗi, Microsoft zai ba wa katin izini ta yin wani ƙarin caji na wucin gadi ga asusunka. Ba za ka iya biya komai ba har sai ka sayi wani abu daga Wurin adana.
data.comment: The description is only for CreditCard use for WindowsStore(Win-iframe and Windows partner).

data.name: Literal.CreditCardDesc.OfficeMarketPlace
data.value:
When you add a credit card as a payment method, you might see a small charge on your card. We do this to verify the credit card number. The charge is only temporary.
If you buy something with a credit card from another country/region, your bank might add an international transaction fee. Contact your bank for more information.

data.name: Word.SignatureAndAuthNote
data.value: Ta sa hannu ga wannan takardar wakilci, ka bayar da hanyar ba da damar samun bayanai (A) Microsoft Payments Ltd. ("Microsoft") don aika umarni ga bankinka don ɗiba daga asusunka, kuma (B) bankinka ya ɗebi asusunka bisa bin umurnai na Microsoft. A zaman wani ɓangare na haƙƙoƙinka, kana da dama ta ramuwa daga bankinka a ƙarƙashin yarjejeniya da yanayi na yarjejeniyarka da bankinka. Dole ne a yi da'awar ramuwa cikin makonni 8 da ya fara daga kwanan watan da aka ɗebe kuɗi daga asusunka. An bayyana haƙƙoƙinka a cikin wani bayani da za ka iya samu daga bankinka.

data.name: Word.SEPA.TermConditions
data.value: Ta amfani da wannan wakilci,ka zaɓi Ɗibewar Kai Tsaye a zaman hanyar biyan kuɗinka. Amfani da kake yi da Ɗibewar Kai Tsaye sharaɗi na amincewa da kuma bin waɗannan sharuɗɗa. Ka ba wa Microsoft Payments Ltd. ("mu") ya buƙaci biyan kuɗi daga bankinka na adadin kuɗi zuwa Microsoft. Dole ne ka tabbata cewa: (i) ka samar da adireshin imel mai ƙarfi don sadarwa da kuma sanarwa; (ii) bankinka zai amince da karɓar ɗibewar kai tsaye; (iii) kana da isassun kuɗi a ranar ɗauka; and (iv) ba a soke wakilcin ka ba (ban da kamar wanda yake tafe) ko sokewa. Kasa bin waɗannan sharuɗɗa wanda za su haifar da rashin biyan kuɗi, ba zai warware wajibcinka ba na biyan mu duk wani kuɗi da muke bin ka ba a kuma lokacin biya ba. Tuntuɓe mu don soke wannan wakilci ko ka zaɓi wani nau’in biyan kuɗi. Za mu soke wakilcinka da zarar mun karɓi sanarwarka. Ɗibewar Kai Tsaye na samuwa bisa zaɓinmu, idan kuma ba ya samuwa, za mu tuntuɓe ka don shirya wani madadi.
data.comment: The content of "Term & Conditions" for SEPA.

data.name: Word.MSOnline.SignatureAndAuthNote
data.value: Ta sa hannu ga wannan fam na wakilci, ka ba wa (A) Microsoft Online, Inc. ("Microsoft") dama ta aika umurnai zuwa bankinka don ɗibar asusunka, kuma (B) bankinka ya ɗebi asusunka bisa bin umarnin Microsoft. A zaman wani ɓangare na hakkinka, kana da iko na samun wata ramuwa daga bankinka a ƙarƙashin sharuɗɗa da ƙa’idoji na yarjejeniyarka tare da bankinka. Dole ne a yi da’awar ramuwa cikin makonni 8 farawa daga kwanan watan da ake ɗebe asusunka. An bayyanana hakkokinka a cikin wani jawabi da ka karɓa daga bankinka.
data.comment: The signature and auth note for Adcenter.

data.name: Word.SEPA.MSOnline.TermConditions
data.value: Ta sa hannu ga wannan fam na wakilci, ka zaɓi Ɗibewar kai Tsaye a zaman tsarin biyanka. Amfani da kake yi da Ɗebewar kai Tsaye sharaɗi ne na yarda da kuma bin waɗannan sharuɗɗa. Ka ba wa Microsoft Online Inc. wa (A) Microsoft Online, Inc. ("we" or "us") don ya buƙaci biyan kuɗi daga bankinka yawan kuɗi na Microsoft. Dole ne ka tabbatar da cewa: (i) ka samar da wani adireshin imel mai aiki don sadarwa da kuma sanarwa; (ii) bankinka zai karɓi tarin ɗibewar kai tsaye; (iii) kana da isassun kuɗi a ranar ɗauka; da kuma (iv) ba a soke wakilcinka ba (ban da na ƙasa) ko ƙwace shi ba. Kasa bin waɗannan sharuɗɗa wanda suke haifar da rashin-biya, ba sa kawar da wajibcinka na biyan mu duk wasu adadin kuɗi da kuma lokaci. Tuntuɓe mu don soke wannan izini ko ka zaɓi wani nau’in biyan kuɗi daban. Za mu soke wakilcinka da zarar mun karɓi sanarwarka. Ɗebewar kai Tsaye tana samuwa bisa ganin daman mu, kuma idan ba ta samu ba, za mu tuntuɓe ka don shirya wata hanya daban.
data.comment: The term & conditions for Adcenter.

data.name: Literal.ACH.SubscriptionAgreement
data.value: By checking this box, you authorize (A) Microsoft Payments Ltd. ("Microsoft") to send instructions to your bank to debit your account, and (B) your bank to debit your account in accordance with the instructions of Microsoft. As part of your rights, you are entitled to a refund from your bank under the terms and conditions of your agreement with your bank. A refund must be claimed within 8 weeks starting from the date on which your account was debited. Your rights are explained in a statement that you can obtain from your bank.

data.name: Literal.ACH.SubscriptionAgreement.New
data.value: Idan ka yi rajista ko ka zaɓi akantin bankinka a zaman hanyar biyan kuɗi naka, kana ba wa Microsoft (ko wakilinsa) izinin tayar da ɗebe kuɗi guda ko fiye da haka don jimlar yawan kuɗi (da suka haɗa haraja da suke sanya, kuɗaɗe da farasoshin turo kaya) na kayanka ko cajin rajista (gwargwadon sharuɗɗan sabis na rajistarka) daga akantin bankinka (da kuma, idan wajibi ne, tayar da sakawa kuɗi sau ɗaya ko fiye da haka a cikin akantin bankinka don gyara kurakurai, bayar da wata mayar da kuɗi ko dalili makamani), kuma kana ba wa tsangayar sha'anin kuɗi da suke riƙe akantin bankinka izinin cire irin waɗannan ɗebe-ɗebe ko yarda da irin waɗannan sakawa kuɗi. Ka gane cewa wannan bayar da izini zai tsaya a zartacce cikakke kuma zai shafa har ka cire bayanin akantin bankinka daga asusun Microsoft ko asusun Skype.

data.name: Literal.ACH.SubscriptionAgreement.MSfB
data.value: Idan ka yi rajista akantin bankinka a zaman hanyar biyan kuɗi naka, ka amince cewa wancan wani akanti na kasuwanci ne kuma kana ba wa Microsoft (ko wakilinsa) izinin ɗebe kimar saye-saye da aka ba wa izini. Wannan bayar da izini zai tsaya a zartacce har sai ka share bayanin akantin bankinka daga asusun Microsoft ko asusun Skype.

data.name: Litterate.PayBitcoin.Description
data.value:
Zaɓi ɗaya a cikin zaɓuɓɓukan don ƙara kuɗi: :
• Idan an girka sofwaya na walat na dijital ɗinka a kan kwamfutarka, danna maɓallin 'Biya da Bitcoin'
• Idan an adana walat na dijital ɗinka a kan wayarka, yi sikani lambar sirri na QR ɗin

Biya daidai yawan Bitcoin yadda aka bayyana a ƙasa. Kana da minti 15 don kammala biyan kuɗi ɗin. Shafin zai wartsake ta otomatik da zarar an karɓi wani biyan kuɗi.
data.comment: The help description for pay with Bitcoin

data.name: Literal.PayBitcoin.Description.Line1
data.value: Please choose one of the options to add money:
data.comment: The help description for pay with Bitcoin, line 1

data.name: Literal.PayBitcoin.Description.Line2
data.value: If your digital wallet software is installed on your computer, click the 'Pay with Bitcoin' button
data.comment: The help description for pay with Bitcoin, line 2

data.name: Literal.PayBitcoin.Description.Line3
data.value: If your digital wallet is stored on your smartphone, scan the QR code
data.comment: The help description for pay with Bitcoin, line 3

data.name: Literal.PayBitcoin.Description.Line4
data.value: Please pay the exact Bitcoin amount as quoted below. You have 15 minutes to complete the payment. The page will automatically refresh once a payment is received
data.comment: The help description for pay with Bitcoin, line 4

Your other legal rights are not affected. This transaction is subject to the Microsoft gift card terms and conditions.

data.name: Literal.Error.PolicyReject
data.value: Yi haƙuri, ba za mu iya karɓi katuna na kafin-biya ba. Don allah gwada wata hanyar biyan kuɗi dabam.
data.comment: The error message for RIME_PrePaid_List_POLICY_REJECT from RISK team.

data.name: Literal.Inicis.BrowserMsg
data.value: Abokan ciniki da suke yin amfani da burauzar yanar-gizo bayan IE (Internet Explorer) ba za su iya yi rajista don sababbin ayyukan Azure ba saboda matsalar girkawar ActiveX. Don allah yi amfani da IE ko wani VM (Inji mai Rumfa) dake da IE don yi rajista. Bayan an yi rajista hanyar biyan kuɗi ɗin, za ka iya yi amfani da sauran burauzar yanar-gizo don ayyukan Azure. Muna nemi gafarar don ƙuntatawar.
data.comment: Only need localization for Korean, other markets do not use it

data.name: Literal.Inicis.BrowserMsgActiveX
data.value: Yayin da wannan ƙofar biyan kuɗi ya dogara da ActiveX, idan kana yin amfani da sauran burauzoji (da suka haɗa Microsoft Edge) ban da Internet Explorer, ba za ka iya ci gaba da aikatawar Azure ba. Don Allah yi amfani da Internet Exploere don yi rajista. Bayan ka yi rajista, kana iya yi amfani da kowcace burauza. Yi haƙuri don ƙuntatawa.
data.comment: Only need localization for Korean, other markets do not use it

data.name: Literal.Inicis.NameMsg
data.value: Don allah shiga da sunanka a Turanci domin a nuna shi daidai a kan rasit-rasit ɗinka.
data.comment: Only need localization for Korean, other markets do not use it

data.name: Literal.Authorization.WarningMsg
data.value: Wataƙila za ka gani wani riƙewa na wucin gadi a kan jumlar katin banki ɗinka. Ba za a caje katinka ba.
data.comment: Added to warn customers about authorization charges.

data.name: Literal.Authorization.Azure.WarningMsg
data.value: Ba za a caji katinka ba, ko da yake mai yiwuwa ka gan wani riƙewar izini na wucin gadi.
data.comment: Added to warn customers about authorization charges.

data.name: Literal.Error.AuthorizationFail
data.value: Ba mu iya ba da izini na wannan hanyar biyan kuɗi ba. Idan ka ci gaba da samun wannan saƙo, gwada wata hanyar biyan kuɗi dabam ko tuntuɓi sabis na abokin ciniki don taimako.
data.comment: The error message shown when card authorization fails for internal reasons.

data.name: Literal.Error.InvalidAccountName
data.value: Sunan mamallakin asusu ɗinka bai da inganci, don allah shigar da bayani mai inganci.
data.comment: The error message shown when account name is invalid.

data.name: Literal.Error.InvalidCountry
data.value: Don allah shigar da bayanin ƙasa mai inganci.
data.comment: The error message shown when country is invalid.

data.name: Literal.NonSimMobi.Heading
data.comment: [PIDL] 'Add a mobile phone' is a heading for a page, where phone number is collected from a user.

data.name: Literal.NonSimMobi.MobileOperator
data.comment: [PIDL] 'Pick your mobile operator' is the label for a field, where user selects his/her mobile operator.

data.comment: [PIDL] 'Your Phone Number' is the label for a field, where phone number is collected from a user.

data.name: Literal.NonSimMobi.PhoneNumberWithSentenceCasing
data.comment: [PIDL] 'Your phone number' is the label for a field, where phone number is collected from a user, difference in sentence casing.

data.name: Literal.NonSimMobi.Footer
data.value: Idan ka zaba Gabatar da, za mu aika wata lambar sirri zuwa ga wayarka. Shigar da ita a kan shafi na gaba. Haka nan za mu san kai ne da gaske.
data.comment: [PIDL] A SMS would be sent to the user phone number, which should be entered in the next page.

data.name: Literal.NonSimMobi.Disclaimer
data.comment: [PIDL] 'Standard messages rates apply.' is a disclaimer shown to the user that standard message rates apply for receiving the code on phone number.

data.name: Literal.NonSimMobi.MessageRate.Text
data.value: Daidaitaccen kuɗin saƙo suna iya sanya. Duba mai sarrafa wayarhannu ɗinka don cikakkun bayanai.
data.comment: [PIDL]

data.name: Literal.NonSimMobi.AgreementSequence1
data.comment: [PIDL] This is the first part of the text shown in the agreement of NonSimMobi. This string is concatenated with the following string

data.name: Literal.NonSimMobi.AgreementSequence2
data.value: , za mu aika wata lambar sirri zuwa wayarka. Shigar da ita a kan shafi na gaba. Haka nan za mu san kai ne da gaske.

data.name: Literal.NonSimMobi.SMSCode
data.comment: [PIDL] 'Enter the code' is the label for a field, where a SMS code is collected from the user.

data.value: Shigar da lambar sirri aikatawa ɗin

data.name: Literal.NonSimMobi.SMSCode.Invalid
data.value: Bincika kuma sake shigar da lambar sirri ɗin. Lambar sirri da ka shigar da ba ta da inganci.
data.comment: [PIDL] 'Check and re-enter the code. The code you entered is not valid.' is the error description for a field, where a SMS code is collected from the user.

data.name: Literal.NonSimMobi.Error.RejectedByProvider
data.value: Bincika lambar wayarka. Mai sarrafa wayarhannu da ka zaba yana cewa ba ta da inganci.
data.comment: [PIDL]

data.name: Literal.NonSimMobi.Error.MOAccountNotFound
data.value: Bincika lambar wayarka. Mai sarrafa wayarhannu da ka zaba bai iya samun waccan lamba ba.

data.name: Literal.CreditCard.ErrorMessage.HasSpaces
data.value: Ba a yarda da sarari a cikin lambar kati ɗin
data.comment: [PIDL] This is error message that is thrown if the credit card has spaces

data.name: Literal.ErrorMessage.RequiredFieldEmpty
data.value: Wani fili da ake buƙata fanko ne
data.comment: [PIDL] This is error message that is thrown if a required field is empty

data.name: Literal.ErrorMessage.RequiredFieldEmpty.Backup
data.value: Wannan wani fili da ake buƙata ne
data.comment: [PIDL] This is backup error message that is thrown if a required field is empty

data.name: Literal.ChinaUnionPay.ErrorMessage.TooManyOperations
data.value: Jira kaɗan kafin ka nemi wata sabuwar lambar sirri. Buƙatunka sun wuce iyakar.
data.comment: [PIDL] This is error message that is thrown if the user tries to enter invalid security code for the sms challenge too many times

data.name: Literal.ChinaUnionPay.ErrorMessage.InvalidChallengeCode
data.value: Bincika lambar sirri ɗinka. Wadda ka shigar da ba ta da inganci.
data.comment: [PIDL] This is error message that is thrown if user enters an invalid security code for the sms challenge

data.name: Literal.ChinaUnionPay.ErrorMessage.PaymentInstrumentAddAlready
data.value: Ƙara wani kati dabam. Wannan ya riga yana cikin asusunka.
data.comment: [PIDL] This is error message that is thrown if user tries to add a card that already exists in thier account

data.name: Literal.ChinaUnionPay.ErrorMessage.ChallengeCodeExpired
data.value: Buƙata wata sabuwar lambar sirri. Wannan ta ƙare aiki.
data.comment: [PIDL] This is error message that is thrown if user tries to enter a security code to sms challenge that has expired already

data.name: Literal.ChinaUnionPay.ErrorMessage.CardNumberOrExpiryValidationFailed
data.value: Bincika lambar kati da kwanan watan ƙarewa na katinka.
data.comment: [PIDL] This is error message that is thrown if user enters an invalid Card number or expiration

data.name: Literal.ChinaUnionPay.ErrorMessage.ExpiryDateValidationFailed
data.value: Bincika kwanan wata ɗinka. Wannan ya ƙare aiki.
data.comment: [PIDL] This error is shown when either the card has expired or is invalid.

data.name: Literal.ChinaUnionPay.ErrorMessage.CardNumberAndPhoneMismatch
data.value: Bincika lambobin kati da na waya ɗinka. Ba su dace ba.
data.comment: [PIDL] This error is shown when the user enters a Card or Phone nubmer that dont match.

data.name: Literal.ChinaUnionPay.ErrorMessage.CardNumberValidationFailed
data.value: Bincika lambar katinka. Wannan ba ta da inganci.
data.comment: [PIDL] This error is shown when the user enters a card number that is invalid.

data.name: Literal.ErrorMessage.ProcessorUnreachable
data.value: Sake gwadawa wancan. Wani abu ya faru daga gare mu. Jirawa kaɗan yana iya taimaka.
data.comment: [PIDL] This is error message that is thrown if the processor is unreachable for the current provider

data.name: Literal.ErrorMessage.ProcessorTimeout

Don yi canje-canje, je ka furofayil ɗinka a PayPal.com kuma sabunta biyan kuɗi ɗinka da aka yarda da kafin nan. Duba dokokin biyan kuɗi na PayPal a PayPal.com.

data.name: Literal.ACH.CheckBoxContent
data.value: Ta sa wa alama a wannan akwati, ka ba da izini ga (A) Microsoft Payments Ltd. ("Microsoft") don aika umurnu ga bankinka domin a ɗebe kuɗi daga asusunka, da kuma (B) bankinka domin a ɗebe asusunka gwargwadon umurnun Microsoft. A zaman wani kashi na haƙƙoƙinka, kana da dama ga mayarwa da kuɗi daga bankinka a ƙarƙashin sharuɗɗa da ƙa'idoji na yarjejeniyarka tare da bankinka. Dole ne a karɓi wata mayarwa da kuɗin a cikin makonni 8 daga kwanan watan inda aka ɗebe kuɗi daga asusunka. An bayyana haƙƙoƙinka a cikin wata jumla da kake iya samu daga bankinka.
data.comment: [PIDL]

data.name: Literal.CIBUpgradeTOU.Header
data.value: Sabunta zuwa biya-biyan kuɗi da aka gabannin yarda naka

data.name: Literal.CIBUpgradeTOU.SubHeader
data.value: Yanzu za ka iya yi amfani da izinin biya-biyan kuɗi na Microsoft da aka yarda da shi gabanni duk inda PayPal yake samuwa a lokacin da kake biya a kan Microsoft.

data.name: Literal.CIBUpgradeTOU.MigrationText.US
data.value: Yi amfani da PayPal don biya-biyan kuɗi na gaba a kan dandalin Microsoft. Idan kana da wata ragowar PayPal, za a yi amfan ida waccan ragowa da farko, ko ma idan ka zaɓi wata hanyar biyan kuɗi da ka fi so. Idan ba ka zaɓi wata hanyar biyan kuɗi da ka fi so ba, za a yi amfani da hanyar biyan kuɗi na asali naka. Idan hanyar biyan kuɗi da aka fi so ko na asali ya ƙara aiki ko an ƙi ta, PayPal zai caji hanyar biyan kuɗi na tsimi naka. Za ka iya saita ko canza hanyar biyan kuɗi naka, ko soke wannan bayar da izini a kowane lokaci a cikin Saitunanka a Paypal.com. Har sai ka saita wata hanyar biyan kuɗi a cikin Saitunanka, hanyar biyan kuɗi da aka yi amfani da shi zai bi manufofin biyan kuɗi a kan PayPal.com.
data.comment: Text for United States, Canada, Brazil

data.name: Literal.CIBUpgradeTOU.MigrationText.DE
data.value: Ka yarda da cewa Microsoft zai iya yaɗa umurnun biyan kuɗi naka zuwa ga PayPayl, domin ka iya biya da PayPal kai tsaye a kan Microsoft zuwa Microsoft da kuma zuwa masu karɓi biyan kuɗi da aka gano ta yin amfani da dandalin Microsoft. Ka yarda PayPal ya raba cikakkun bayanan cinikayyar PayPal taka tare da Microsoft da suka haɗa bayani da ake kullum raba tare da wani mai karɓi biyan kuɗi a ƙarƙashin tamu Dokar Tsare Sirri. Wannan yana ba wa Microsoft damar duba idan biyan kuɗi naka ya samu nasara da kuma don taimaka cika cinikayyarka. PayPal zai iya bari Microsoft ya sani idan ka janye yardarka. Ka umarci PayPal ya kula da buƙatun biyan kuɗi da aka aika ta wajen Microsoft yadda aka ba da izinin daga gare ka. Idan kana da wata raguwar PayPal, za a yi amfani da ita da farko. Idan aka ƙi masomin samun kuɗi naka na asali ko ya ƙare aiki, za a caji masomin samun kuɗi na tsimi. Za ka iya soke wannan bayar da izini ko canza masomin samun kuɗi da ka fi so a kowane lokaci a cikin asusun PayPal ɗinka. Idan ka biya a cikin wani kuɗin ƙasa da ba ainihin kuɗin ƙasa na Asusun PayPal ɗinka ba, PayPal zai juya yawan kuɗin ta yin amfani da namu kimar ta lokacin.
data.comment: Text for Germany, Netherlands, Sweden, United Kingdom, Russia

data.name: Literal.MSFB.OrgProfile.LegalText
data.value: A inda yake sanya, ya kamata abokin ciniki na Turai su samar da cikakkun bayanai na lambar rajista ta VAT tasu mai inganci. Kasawar yin haka yakan iya shafi kularwar VAT ta takardar farashi da aka bayar ta wajen Microsoft.
data.comment: MSFB update organization profile legal text

data.name: Literal.EG.OrgProfile.LegalText
data.value: Where applicable, Egypt customers should provide details of their valid VAT registration number. Failure to do so may impact upon the VAT treatment of the invoice issued by Microsoft.
data.comment: Egypt update organization profile legal text

data.name: Literal.MSFB.OrgProfile.LegalText.NZ.Line1
data.value: Harajin kayayyaki da hidimomi na Ƙasar New Zealand at 15% yana sanya ga hidimomi na nesa ta ƙetaren iyaka da kuma kayayyaki mara ainihi da aka samar da su ta masu samarwa mara mazauni ga mutum da suke zaune a cikin Ƙasar New Zealand sai dai mutumin wani kasuwanci da aka yi rajista da GST. Dole wani mai samarwa ta kula da mai karɓa a zaman ba mutumin da aka yi rajista ba sai dai mai karɓa yana sanar da mai samarwa cewa su wani mutumin da aka yi rajista ne kuma yana samar da lambar rajista ta GST na NZ tasu.
data.comment: MSFB update organization profile legal text for New Zealand

data.name: Literal.MSFB.OrgProfile.LegalText.NZ.Line2
data.value: A cikin wannan haɗi, sai a samar da lambar rajista na GST na NZ na ƙungiyarka. Idan ba haka ba, ƙila a caje GST na NZ a 15% a kan samarwarmu gare ka.
data.comment: MSFB update organization profile legal text for New Zealand

data.name: Literal.MSFB.OrgProfile.LegalText.NZ.Line3
data.value: Idan akwai wani canji ga lambar rajista ta GST na NZ na ƙungiyarka ko idan ƙungiyarka daga gaba ta cire rajista don GST a Ƙasar New Zealand, don Allah sanar da mu nan da nan.
data.comment: MSFB update organization profile legal text for New Zealand

data.name: Literal.MSFB.OrgProfile.LegalText.BR.Line1
data.value: Don Allah shigar da wani CNJP idan kai wani kamfani ne ko ƙungiya ta shari'a ne. Idan ba ka shigar da CNJP ba yana nufi kai wani mutum ne.
data.comment: MSFB update organization profile legal text for Brazil

data.name: Literal.MSFB.OrgProfile.LegalText.BR.Line2
data.value: Wannan wata buƙata ta shari'a ce.
data.comment: MSFB update organization profile legal text for Brazil

data.name: Literal.MSFB.OrgProfile.LegalText.UnknownCountries
data.value: Wannan oda tana buƙata ƙarin yardar bashi don a yi caji kuɗi ta takardar farashi. Don Allah zaɓi wannan akwatin sa maki don yarda da wani binciken bashi. Za a tuntuɓe ka don ƙarin bayani. Odar za ta jira yarda kuma babu lasisoci da za a iya raba har sai an yarda da bashin. Wannan hanyar sarrafa zai iya ɗauka har makonni biyu don kammala. (Wataƙila za ka iya kuma canza hanyoyin biyan kuɗi don a ci gaba da odar.)
data.comment: MSFB update organization profile legal text for Unknown Countries

data.name: Literal.PayPalUpdateAgreement.AgreeAndContinue
data.comment: Agree & Continue button

data.name: Literal.PayPalUpdateAgreement.AgreeAndPay
data.comment: Agree & Pay button

data.name: Literal.PayPalUpdateAgreement.Heading
data.value: Wani sabuntawa ga yarjejeniyar asusun Paypal naka tare da Microsoft
data.comment: PayPal Scenario Strings - Heading for the update Paypal billing agreement page

data.name: Literal.PayPalUpdateAgreement.Subheading
data.value: Idan ka yarda da wannan sabuntawa, za ka iya yi amfani da asusun Paypal naka duk inda Paypal yana samuwa tare da Microsoft Pay.
data.comment: PayPal Scenario Strings - Subheading for the update Paypal billing agreement page

data.name: Literal.PayPalUpdateAgreement.Text
data.value: Ka yarda ka bar Microsoft ya yaɗa umurnun biyan kuɗi na PayPal ɗinka zuwa PayPal don saye-saye kai tsaye zuwa Microsoft ko wani mai karɓi biyan kuɗi da aka gano da yake yin amfani da wani dandalin Microsoft. Idan kana da wata ragowar PayPal, za a yi amfani da ita da farko. Idan an ƙi masomin samun kuɗi da ka fi so ko na asali ko ta ƙare aiki, za a caji masomin samun kuɗi na tsimi naka. Kana bari PayPal ya raba cikakkun bayanan cinikayyar PayPal taka tare da Microsoft. Rabawar cikakkun bayanan cinikayyar PayPal yana ba wa Microsoft damar sani idan biyan kuɗi naka ya samu nasara, don taimaka cika cinikayyarka da kuma samar da rasitocin biyan kuɗi yadda aka gano a cikin Dokar Tsare Sirri na PayPal. Kana umarci PayPal ya kula da buƙatun biyan kuɗi da aka aika ta wajen Microsoft a zaman an ba da izinin daga gare ka gwargwadon Yarjejeniyar Mai Amfani na PayPal. Idan ka biya a cikin wani kuɗin ƙasa da ba ainihin kuɗin ƙasa na Asusun PayPal ɗinka ba, PayPal zai juya yawan kuɗin ta yin amfani da tamu kima ta lokacin. Za ka iya soke wannan bayar da izini ko canza masomin samun kuɗi da ka fi so a kowane lokaci a cikin asusun PayPal naka. Idan ka janye yardarka wajen yin amfani da PayPal a kan Microsoft, ƙila PayPal zai sanar wa Microsoft.
data.comment: PayPal Scenario Strings - Agreement text for the update Paypal billing agreement page

data.name: Literal.Klarna.Add.Header
data.comment: Header for add Klarna page

data.name: Literal.Klarna.Add.Subheader
data.value: Klarna wani ƙaramin mai bayar da bashi ne. Suna biya sayanka yanzu. A lokacin da aka turo odarka, suna aika maka ta saƙon imel wata takardar farashi da kuma cikakkun bayanan biyan kuɗi. Ka yarda ka biya su bashin a cikin kwanaki 14 na kwanan watan takardar farashi. Idan kana da ƙarin tambayoyi ko kana buƙata taimako, tuntuɓi Klarna.
data.comment: Subheader for add Klarna page

data.name: Literal.Klarna.Add.Subheader2
data.comment: {ValidStrings=nb-no;"Betal etter levering med Klarna."}{ValidStrings=fi-fi;"Maksa myöhemmin Klarnalla."}{ValidStrings=sv-se;"Betala efter leverans med Klarna."}{ValidStrings=da-dk;"Betal efter levering med Klarna."}{ValidStrings=de-de;"Zahlen Sie nach Lieferung mit Klarna."}{ValidStrings=de-at;"Zahlen Sie nach Lieferung mit Klarna."}

data.name: Literal.Klarna.Add.Subheader3
data.value: Samu kayayyakinka da farko sai ka biya bayan isarwa a lokacin a kake yi sayayya da mu. Babu caje-caje ko ruwa, kawai biya don abin da ka riƙe. Kawai zaɓi Klarna a fitarwa.
data.comment: {ValidStrings=nb-no;" Hver gang du handler med oss kan du få varene dine først og betale etter levering. Ingen avgifter eller noen skjulte gebyrer. Betal bare for det du vil beholde. Velg Klarna i kassen."}{ValidStrings=fi-fi;" Kun teet ostoksia meillä, saat tuotteesi ensin ja maksat vasta toimituksen jälkeen. Ei kuluja tai korkoja, maksat vain ne tuotteet, mitkä haluat pitää. Valitse Klarna kassalla."}{ValidStrings=sv-se;" Få dina varor först och betala efter leverans när du handlar hos oss. Ingen ränta eller dolda avgifter, betala bara för det du behåller. Välj Klarna i kassan."}{ValidStrings=da-dk;" Hver gang du handler med os kan du få dine varer først og betale efter levering. Ingen gebyrer eller renter, betal kun for det du beholder. Vælg Klarna ved kassen."}{ValidStrings=de-de;" Mit Klarna Rechnung schauen Sie sich Ihre Bestellung zuerst an und entscheiden dann, was Sie behalten möchten. Keine Gebühren oder Zinsen, zahlen Sie nur für das, was Sie behalten."}{ValidStrings=de-at;" Mit Klarna Rechnung schauen Sie sich Ihre Bestellung zuerst an und entscheiden dann, was Sie behalten möchten. Keine Gebühren oder Zinsen, zahlen Sie nur für das, was Sie behalten."}

data.name: Literal.Klarna.CheckBox.Text
data.value: A lokacin da nake yin amfani da Klarna don biya saye-saye, ina yarda da cewa Microsoft yana iya gusar da bayaan da ake buƙata don sarrafa oda tawa zuwa ga Klarna wanda yake haɗa wani binciken shaida da kuma kimar bashi. Zan iya ɗanyata yardata a kowane lokaci tare tasiri don gobe. Sharuɗɗa da ƙa'idojin dillalin suna iya sanya kuma.
data.comment: Klarna checkbox term text

data.name: Literal.MSfB.EditSepa.LegalString
data.value: Idan ka sa hannu a wannan fom na umarni, kana ba wa (A) Microsoft Payments Ltd. ("Microsoft") izinin aika umurnu ga bankinka don ɗebe kuɗi daga akantinka da kuma (B) bankinka izinin ɗebe kuɗi daga akantinka gwargwadon umurnun daga Microsoft Payments Ltd. ("Microsoft"). A zaman wani kashi na haƙƙoƙinka, kana da damar samu wata mayar da kuɗi daga bankinka a ƙarƙashin sharuɗɗa da ƙa'idojin yarjejeniyar bankinka. Dole ne a yi diyyar wata mayar da kuɗi a cikin makonni 8 farawa daga kwanan watan da aka ɗebe kuɗi daga akantinka. An bayyana haƙƙoƙinka a cikin wani bayani da za ka iya samu daga bankinka.
data.comment: legal string for edit sepa

data.name: Literal.OfficeOOBE.AddCreditCard.Info1
data.value: Don sabuntawa mara iyaka, ƙara wani zaɓen biyan kuɗi domin kai ya ci gaba da jin daɗin Office bayan gwajinka ya ƙare. Kada ka damu, za ka iya soke kowane lokaci.

data.name: Literal.OfficeOOBE.AddCreditCard.Info2
data.value: Za a adana adireshin caji kuɗi da kuma zaɓen biyan kuɗi ɗinka a cikin asusun Microsoft ɗinka, wanda yake sauƙaƙa sayan kayayyaki da kuma sabis-sabis duk inda ka shiga da ()Imel. Don canza saitunanka, je ka account.microsoft.com.
data.comment: The ()EmailAddress is parameter that is used and does not need to be localized

data.name: Literal.iDealBA.Legal.Text
data.value: Don wata rajista ta hanyar ɗebe kuɗi na kai tsaye za mu nema ka biya € 0,01 ta hanyar iDEAL domin a tantance akantin bankinka. Za a mayar da € 0,01 ɗin daga baya.
data.comment: {ValidStrings=nl-nl;"Voor een abonnement via automatische incasso zal eenmalig gevraagd worden om een betaling van € 0,01 te verrichten via iDEAL ter verificatie van uw bankrekeningnummer. Deze € 0,01 wordt naderhand weer terug op uw rekening gestort."}

data.name: Literal.CreditCard.CVVHelpDialogTextCloseCVVButton
data.value: CVV is the Card Verification Value on your credit or debit card. On Visa, MasterCard and Discover cards, CVV is the last 3 numbers on the back of your card. On American Express cards, CVV is a 4 digit number on the front of the card, above the main card number. Close CVV dialog.
data.comment: This is the text for the CVV help dialog

data.name: Literal.CreditCard.WhereIsMyCvvLast3DigitsText
data.value: Where is my CVV? The last 3 digits on the back.
data.comment: This is the hint for CVV textbox in xboxnative

data.name: Literal.CreditCard.WhereIsMyCvvFront4DigitsText
data.value: Where is my CVV? The 4 digit code on the front.
data.comment: This is the hint for CVV amex textbox in xboxnative

data.name: Literal.NonSimMobi.AddHeading
data.comment: This is the header for the add Non Sim Mobi flow.

data.name: Literal.NonSimMobi.ChooseOperator
data.comment: This is the instruction to choose a phone operator

data.name: Literal.NonSimMobi.CodeInstruction
data.value: We'll send a code to your phone. Enter it on the next page that way we'll know it's really you.
data.comment: This is the instruction of how the OTP code works.

data.comment: This is the heading for the NonSimMobi show info page.

data.name: Literal.AliPay.Instruction

data.comment: This is the instruction on how to add an Alipay pi to your account.

data.comment: This is the header for the Alipay show info page.

data.name: Literal.AliPay.ShowInfoPhone

data.name: Literal.XboxCardApplyWeb.Disclaimer
data.value: By clicking Continue, Microsoft will send limited Xbox account information to Barclays to assist with your application. This includes contact details to prefill your application and information about your engagement with Xbox, including the duration of your Xbox account and when you last made a Microsoft purchase. The data you provide to Barclays in your credit card application or after becoming a cardmember is governed by Barclays Privacy Policy and credit card Terms and Conditions. If you click Cancel, the data will not be sent.
